channel.title: English on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂
channel.description: Recent content in English on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂

item.title: ADJECTIVE Encounters
item.description: Really she is the strangest creature in the world, far from heroic, variable as a weathercock, “bashful, insolent; chaste, lustful; prating, silent; laborious, delicate; ingenious, heavy; melancholic, pleasant; lying, true; knowing, ignorant; liberal, covetous, and prodigal”— in short, so complex, so indefinite, …             –Virginia Woolf, The Common Reader, First Series (1925) I don’t know if Ernest Hemingway is still one of the recognized dominant writers in colleges English education.
